channel.title: 525 Servers
channel.description:
Sigh i feel a real noob for asking this but im really not used to 525's and the way the files are set out but here we go how do you make yourself an admin :eek:
Also my server just has commands for levels such as ::master and more id like an object to give xp for now how could i go about doing so?

item.dc:creator: @kab963 kab963
item.description:
@kab963 wrote:

your welcome

Read full topic

item.title: 525 Servers
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Oh, I’m only paying 1/4 attention. When I first said what you said, I meant ‘my server’

Read full topic

item.title: 525 Servers
item.dc:creator: @Setsuna Setsuna
item.description:
@Setsuna wrote:

[quote="_™, post:13, topic:289542"][quote author=Setsuna link=topic=382722.msg2874385#msg2874385 date=1247962138]

It’s only ‘special stuff’ if you give it to them. I could make someone with 100 rights have special priviledges.

Unless you used this statement:

if(playerRights >=2)
out.write(2);

That’s for 317’s methods though.[/quote]

True. But, on a lot of servers it is not like that. (yet I don’t like it)

Unless you used this statement:

if(playerRights >=2)
out.write(2);

That’s for 317’s methods though.

True. But, on a lot of servers it is not like that.

I only care about mah server.[/quote]

I meant I had already said that about a minute before…

@topic Go into login.java and search for “moderator” or “playerrights”

Read full topic

item.title: 525 Servers
item.dc:creator: @kab963 kab963
item.description:
@kab963 wrote:

goto data saved games open the account you want admin with notepad or somthing and look for 0 change the 0 to 2file save and your done!

1 = mod
2 = admin
3= owner
4 = co-owner i think

Read full topic
